## syncStates() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function syncStates(stateSyncConfigs: Array<IStateSyncConfig<any>>): ISyncStateRef;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  stateSyncConfigs | <code>Array&lt;IStateSyncConfig&lt;any&gt;&gt;</code> | Array of [IStateSyncConfig](./kibana-plugin-plugins-kibana_utils-public-state_sync.istatesyncconfig.md) to sync |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ISyncStateRef`

## Example

sync multiple different sync configs

```ts
syncStates([
  {
    storageKey: '_s1',
    stateStorage: stateStorage1,
    stateContainer: stateContainer1,
  },
  {
    storageKey: '_s2',
    stateStorage: stateStorage2,
    stateContainer: stateContainer2,
  },
]);

```
